BitLib

BitLib is my onw Spigot utility library which aims to make development faster and more efficient.
It's still in its early development, so it doesn't always reach its goal.

Features

Since BitLib is far from being ready for a public release, its features will just be briefly listed:

  • ItemBuilder with HeadDatabase integration and Templating features
  • Selfregistering CommandHandlers and EventListeners
  • Improved YAML configuration class
  • Commonly used database methods
  • Various utilities for players and items
  • Log filters
